Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Writer: Simon Kinberg (screenplay by), Bryan Singer (story by), Simon Kinberg (story by), Michael Dougherty (story by), Dan Harris (story by)
Actors: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Nicholas Hoult
Plot: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.
Production: Bad Hat Harry, Donners' Company, Kinberg Genre
